title: What the F**k Do We Do? Sensemaking & Tribalism
description:
Rebel Wisdom's Sensemaking Series is all about the problem of Truth in the digital age. 

This film looks at how the alternative media creates and enforces tribal boundaries, and argues that some kind of mediation is needed to tackle the spiral of polarisation and division.

The first film 'What the F**k Is Going On?' looked at the crisis of traditional media, and has had 330,000 views in a month: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VkKnOEQlwl4&t=14s

Other films and articles referenced in this film:

'Culture War 2.0' Peter Limberg: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jHGbA5XcjIo&t=40s

Check out Peter's Stoa project: https://www.thestoa.ca/

Internet of Beefs, Venkatesh Rao: https://www.ribbonfarm.com/2020/01/16/the-internet-of-beefs/

Matt Taibbi & Bret Weinstein, The Dark Horse Podcast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xojSWHrar9A

Matt Taibbi 'The Left is Now the Right': https://taibbi.substack.com/p/the-left-is-now-the-right

'What the Right Gets Wrong about Social Justice Culture', Quillette: https://quillette.com/2020/07/20/what-the-right-gets-wrong-about-social-justice-culture/

Can Truth Survive Big Tech? Tristan Harris: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wHQQFOv7QgQ&t=2179s

Humanity's Phase Shift, Daniel Schmachtenberger: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nQRzxEobWco&t=137s

Legacy of Integral, Jamie Wheal: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4krRSqD0Gdg&t=5s

Glitch in the Matrix II, The Origin of the Intellectual Dark Web: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TKeMIWVOnbo&t=2s

'Is the Intellectual Dark Web an Integral Conversation?' Ken Wilber: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U2XK812tSmM&t=70s

To get access to more exclusive content, become a Rebel Wisdom subscriber: https://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans

You can listen to a podcast versions of our films on Spotify or Apple Podcasts by searching 'Rebel Wisdom' or download episodes from our Podbean page: https://rebelwisdom.podbean.com/
